text: ee Jaun Elia’s real name was Syed Jaun Asghar. Jaun Elia, the renowned poet, biographer Scholar and a Marxist poet, philosopher, dreamer, and charismatic performer was born in 1931 in Amroha, Uttar Pradesh Pradesh of undivided India. He was against partition, but finally chose to join Pakistan. During the] past few years, Jaun Elia has taken Urdu poetry circles in cyberspace by storm. A y well-known name among fanatics of Urdu literature during his lifetime, it is only after his death in 200

nown name among fanatics of Urdu literature during his lifetime, it is only after his death in 2002 that his work gained popularity. Today, Jaun Elia is perhaps one of the most googled Urdu poets. @ www.arzevenrs.
